title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item for the first time in library outline view
description:
Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected for the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. The label item should not be selectable on the first attempt.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item is not selectable.
EB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item should be selectable.
SR:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
